alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 12:30PM MST until December 31 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Occasional light snow and cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of an inch or two. * WHERE...Musselshell and Golden Valley. * WHEN...Until noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted by snow, localized blowing snow and poor visibility. Cold wind chills of 20 to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to remain below zero through the day on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
